properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first balloon airmail flight on August 17, 1859, in Lafayette, Indiana, U.S.A., by John Wise with hot-air balloon; cancellation stamp dated August 17, 1984 in Lafayette; includes information on reverse.
